total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the unique number that is present in every row of the input grid.
Q2: Check if this unique number is present in the same column across all rows.
Q3: If the conditions in Q1 and Q2 are met, output this unique number as a single element in a grid.
Q1: Identify the unique number that is present in the last column of the grid.
Q2: Check if this number is surrounded by the same number in all four directions (up, down, left, right) in the grid.
Q3: If the number is surrounded by the same number, then this number is the output grid.
